creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: lines of verse written in varying sizes; red corrections written between lines at L side of sheet; mounted on tan sheet with gold flecks
markings: on back, top edge near right, in pencil: [Chazan]; on back LRC, in pencil, various
medium: Black and red ink on paper
title: Waka Poems with Corrections
